channel.title: Battle of 25 armies - Warhammer Fantasy FM - RoM & Elf win
channel.description:
# Welcome! ![image|690x429](upload://1BoFfY4O5oc3s5HB42ZxHvdlS6N.jpeg)
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Lynch is majority based.
### Journals Will **NOT** be in play.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Flavor: Each of you represent an army, wich is a part of theirs race (faction) in Warhammer Fantasy. For example Realms of man consist of Empire, Bretonia, Norska and many others. Flavor for each of you is however only revealed uppon death and is unknown for the player themselves to prevent angleshooting.
### Rolelist: **[color=green]10 Realms of man[/color]** **[color=ligblue]3 Elves[/color]** **[color=yellow]3 Dwarfs[/color]** **[color=Orange]3 Greenskin[/color]** **[color=Purple]3 Undead[/color]** **[color=red]3 Chaos[/color]**
https://docs.google.com/document/d/16QifChd0pPgShwylxKJ-MDwHrGcpur0rQitxYrqe6-Q/edit#heading=h.xndmdkeorb58
**Order of actions:**
Hider Bus Driving Blocking/Jailkeeping Witching Strategisting Protecting Miscellaneous Killing Investigating/Tracking/Watching
**Night results:** Your target is an ally / is not an ally. Your target was visited by: Your target visited: Your target is/was [rolename] (Consig & Coroner) Your target was killed by (Coroner) You have received a suit/cake/armor/gun. You were healed! You were roleblocked (Roleblocker & Jailkeeper) You were bus driven! Your target was tampered with! (Witch & Strategist) You have died You slept peacefully You received a following message: You were attacked but immune!
**Players:** 1. ~~Livicus~~ - [color=yellow] Dwarven Jailor [/color] 2. Hjasik 3. ~~MaximusPrime~~ - [color=green] RoM Bus Driver [/color] 4. Blizer 5. ~~Alice~~ -> NinjaPenguin 6. ~~Insanity~~ - [color=green] RoM Blacksmith [/color] 7. ~~Nerbins~~ - [color=orange]Greenskin Spy[/color] 8. ~~Overthebin~~ - [color=green] RoM Mayor [/color] 9. ~~astand~~ - [color=red]Chaos Poisoner [/color] 10. ~~Marluxion~~ - [color=orange]Greenskin Tailor[/color] 11. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ - [color=orange]Greenskin Day Vig[/color] 12. ~~Sam17z~~ - [color=orange] Greenskin Observer [/color] 13. ~~BlueStorm~~ - [color=green] RoM Oracle [/color] 14. ~~Icibalus~~ - [color=green] RoM Sleepwalker [/color] 15. ~~Firekitten~~ - [color=green] RoM Tracker [/color] 16. ~~Margaret~~ - [color=orange]Greenskin Tailor[/color] 17. GamerPoke 18. RagnaroekIV 19. ~~Geyde~~ - [color=green] RoM Sleepwalker [/color] 20. ~~PKR~~ - [color=green] RoM Citizen [/color] 21. ~~Luxy~~ - [color=purple] Undead Witch [/color] 22. ~~Twil1ight~~ -> ~~MathBlade~~ [color=red] Chaos Strategist [/color] 23. ~~Mercenary~~ - [color=yellow] Dwarven Bus Driver [/color] 24. ~~Shurian~~ -> ~~SoulShad3r~~ - [color=purple] Undead Citizen [/color] 25. ~~Isaac_Gonzalez~~ - [color=purple] Undead Consigliere [/color]
**Backup:** 1.

22-V

18 is r and 19 was s

Doesnt matter, Elf was spelled, soft was still there.

item.description:
Nerbins:

Marl: Accuses me and Squid of being scum.
Following day: Both me and Squid are dead and are scum.
Everyone: GrEaT rEaDs MoRl! ThErE’s ClEaRlY nOtHiNg OfF hErE!

Can somebody quote the post where Marl said this? I still can’t find it

Also having correct reads shouldn’t be a scumtell if it was town would literally never win the game because everybody who has good reads would be killed off leaving only the people who are wrong :UUU
